short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A notepad for your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Line Writer is a notepad for your new tab page. It features a simple text editor that keeps the line you're typing in the center of the page. Counts characters, words, and sentences as you type.
